title: Technology Excellence Scholarship
description: Supporting students pursuing careers in computer science, software engineering, and related technology fields.
eligibility: Pursuing degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
Demonstrated interest in technology and innovation

title: Creative Minds Design Scholarship
description: Empowering the next generation of designers and creative professionals through financial support and mentorship.
eligibility: Pursuing degree in Design, Fine Arts, or related creative field
applicationRequirements: One letter of recommendation from art instructor

title: STEM Diversity and Inclusion Grant
description: Promoting diversity in STEM fields by supporting underrepresented students in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.
eligibility: Member of underrepresented group in STEM
Pursuing STEM degree at accredited institution
applicationRequirements: Personal statement addressing diversity and inclusion (1000 words)
Resume highlighting STEM activities and leadership

title: Future Business Leaders Scholarship
description: Supporting ambitious students who demonstrate leadership potential and entrepreneurial spirit in business and marketing fields.
eligibility: Pursuing degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
Interest in entrepreneurship or business innovation
applicationRequirements: Two letters of recommendation (one from business professional)
Business plan or marketing project proposal
